description:
The only way out is the way through!

Break out and take revenge!

Run for your life through colorful neon mazes, chased by countless and ever-vigilant security forces.
Be creative - play stealthily to avoid encounters, prepare traps for your enemies  or just rush as fast as you can right in front of their eyes. Figure out how to beat the system and destroy your captors in 24 action-packed levels.  Steal from your dark adversary and leave his world in ruins!

Features

* Unique mix of genres with arcade, action, stealth and puzzle gameplay elements.

24 meticulously designed levels,  each with a different twist.

Creative gameplay - think of your own ways how to beat the game.

Online leaderboards - Your highscore can only grow bigger every time you play.

Signature soundtrack by kubatko (www.kubatko.info)


Visit http://hexage.net
Follow us http://twitter.com/hexage
versionNote: - fixed a bug in editing your user name in the online leaderboard
